item.title: Running the "Real Time Voice Cloning" project in Docker
item.description: Update on 2019-SEP-04: You may come across issues with PyQT5 when running this project, something about a plugin being found but not loaded. If so, try changing the line PyQt5 to PyQt5=5.11.3 within the requirements.txt file of the Real Time Voice Cloning project. Thanks to @dfcv24 for finding this issue! I came across this awesome project called Real Time Voice Cloning by Corentin Jemine and I wanted to give it a shot.
